summary: The module provides test suites for the Kandinsky V2.2 ControlNet image‑to‑image generation pipeline, including quick unit tests and full integration tests that instantiate the required models, execute the pipeline, verify deterministic output, and handle resource cleanup.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability and correctness of the Kandinsky V2.2 ControlNet Img2Img pipeline so that downstream applications can depend on accurate, reproducible image generation results.
